articles.content:

articles.title: How the fentanyl crisis' fourth wave has hit every corner of the US - BBC
articles.description: The epidemic's staggering scale and its infiltration of communities across the nation is laid bare in a new study.
articles.content:
More Americans than ever are dying from fentanyl overdoses as the fourth wave of the opioid epidemic crashes through every community, in every corner of the country.
